Problem name: A + B
(Optional) Problem ID: a_plus_b

## Problem

Given 2 integers, A and B. Print A + B

##  Constraint

- $1 \leq A, B \leq 10^9$


## Solution / Reference

- link to CF blog, arXiv, some other artifacts: https://codeforces.com/blog/entry/15511

## (Optional) Input

```
A B
```

## (Optional) Output

```
Z
```

Z = A + B

## (Optional) Note / Disucussion

- $10^{18}$ is better than $10^9$ ?
